metadata.title: CVE-2018-12247 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in mruby 1.4.1. There is a NULL pointer dereference in mrb_class, related to certain .clone usage, because mrb_obj_clone in kernel.c copies flags other than the MRB_FLAG_IS_FROZEN flag (e.g., the embedded flag).

criterions.comment: mruby package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
